title: Patience at the plate pays off in Tech victory over Radford - Tennessee Tech
content: Patience at the plate pays off in Tech victory over Radford  Tennessee Tech
description: MOBILE, Ala. â€“ An early rally and patience at the plate propelled the Tennessee Tech baseball team to its second win in as many days to start the 2022 campaign, as the Golden Eagles (2-0) defeated Radford (0-2) at the South Alabama Invitational Saturday afternoon, 10-5.
